alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 14 at 4:51AM MST until December 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY BELOW 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected below 6500 feet. * WHERE...Kaibab Plateau below 6500 feet, including Fredonia. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles on US Hwy 89A. Expect periods of very limited visibility due to blowing snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow above 5500-6000 feet is likely from Tuesday evening into Wednesday morning. These conditions will result in significantly reduced visibility on US Hwy 89A throughout this time period.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
